vocabinfos.lsjDefs:
γένν-ημα, ατος, τό,
that which is produced or born, child, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: generally, any product or work, [Refs 5th c.BC+]: in plural, fruits of the earth, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__2 breeding, δηλοῖ τὸ γ. ὠμὸν (i.e. ὄν).. παιδός [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II active, begetting, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__II.2 producing, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
γένημα, ατος, τό,
produce, of the fruits of the earth (compare γέννημα), [NT+3rd c.BC+]; γ. καὶ ἐπιγενήματα [Refs 1st c.AD+], etc. γενημάτιον, τό, diminutive of {γενηΐς}, [Refs]

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
fruit, product, yield, harvest
natural produce, fruit, product, harvest, increase, Mt. 26:29; Mk. 14:25; Lk. 12:18; 22:18; 2Cor. 9:10*
vocabinfos._es_Definition: hijos, progenitura ; fruto, productos agrícolas, cosecha
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 子女, 後代
2) 果實, 農產品
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
1) 子女, 后代
2) 果实, 农产品
